dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

description:
Mii is an inverted indexing system for environment modules. After
installation you will no longer need to load modules to run
applications. NOTE: Additional steps are required after installing the
Spack package to enable Mii in your shell. Please see the README on the
homepage for more information.
name: mii

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
